com.cloudera.director.spi.v1.model

Interface ConfigurationValidator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompositeConfigurationValidator, DefaultConfigurationValidator

    public interface ConfigurationValidator
    Validates a configuration.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void validate(String name, Configured configuration, PluginExceptionConditionAccumulator accumulator, LocalizationContext localizationContext)
      Validates the specified configuration using the specified localization context, accumulating errors and warnings in the specified accumulator.

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        void validate(String name,
            Configured configuration,
            PluginExceptionConditionAccumulator accumulator,
            LocalizationContext localizationContext)
        Validates the specified configuration using the specified localization context, accumulating errors and warnings in the specified accumulator.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the object being validated
        configuration - the configuration to be validated
        accumulator - the exception condition accumulator
        localizationContext - the localization context
